Articles.Content: Are the stock light supposed to blink or do they just stay bright while the light they cast is what blinks. It just looks really weird having a light that stays 100% bright but the light it gives off cycles on and off. I saw the "Aviation Lights" mod, but it doesn't work with 1.13.x. Anything similar that is compatible with the latest version?
Don't they have settings you can select with a r-click? I haven't messed with the lights for a while.
@KSPMoose what doesnt work with Aviation lights?

Aviation lights works for me in 1.12, Private Division does not offer 1.13. Once I edited cfg file to react quicker and it looked much better.

Oh I mean cfg of stock lights. Just take a look at lightBrightenSpeed and lightDimSpeed values and tweak them for your needs.

Edited August 9, 2022 by dci
more detailed
